title: Thought on hiding Chatter from Allies? Riot?
body:
Remember the hide all chat option in settings.

Can we get a hide ally chat option as well. I know this isnt a top priority issue but I do enjoy peaceful non chatter games.

I know there is the mute function but doing that every kinda gets daunting. And seeing a rage message kinda demoralizes you before you even mute them as you already know they are not happy with the game and know you have to try please this one guys so he wont afk in the next few minutes.

This would be a simply lifestyle change.

I also tried physically hiding the chat but its a hindrance some times if you accidentally hit enter and forgot to hit it again to get out of chat box. You would be spamming abilities and nothing would go off until you hit enter again which to your surprise you would find an essay of random  QWER.

Thoughts?

replies.body:
You know, there's this amazing function already in-game that can do exactly what you want.

It's called "mute".
